text:
Loopio | Senior Full-Stack Developer | Toronto| FULL-TIME | https://loopio.applytojob.com/apply/OHrgQKjhOU/Senior-FullSt...

Loopio is a platform that streamlines the way organizations respond to Request for Proposals (RFPs), Due Diligence Questionnaires (DDQs), and Security Questionnaires.

Details: Rapidly build end-to-end features from scratch for Loopio’s web Platform Squash bugs as they come up because you can’t stand crappy software Talk to end users directly because you care about what they think Constantly bring your product ideas to the table because we’ll listen

Feel free to reach out to work@loopio.com for more information :)
